pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Summons and pets pick up items and xp for you, auto-depositing in your inventory. They won't actively seek out items, simply mop up items they happen to be nearby, much like a magnet.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/imbued_jewelry)Imbued Jewelry$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 1 $(br)$(l)Tier:$() Medium$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Other common or jewelry augments.
